title: Rum: The Epic Story Of The Drink That Conquered The World
description: - Contains over 50 recipes for rum-based drinks and dishes that are historical in focus- Rum has never been more popular--there are over 1500 rum labels bottled in more than 40 countries around the world. Bacardi Ltd., the world's largest rum company, earned nearly $3 billion in worldwide sales last year.
author: Charles A. Coulombe
